name: TiCheatSheetGenerator
short_description:
This program allows you to, very easily, generate very nice cheat sheets for in your graphical calculator.

These cheat sheets will be shown in the graph screen instead of the normal screen, which allows for smaller letters and thus more text per page. They also support multiple pages, so you can put a whole lot of text inside one single cheat sheet!

IMPORTANT:
Exiting the cheat sheet on the calculator is done by pressing enter. If you don't do this, the graph screen will still contain the text that was shown at the time of exiting.
You fix this by starting the program and exiting right (with the enter) this time.

The test-cheat sheets were tested on a TI-84+ only.
It should also support the TI-83+ (at least).

To run the program, you must have Python installed (https://www.python.org/).
